downloadDescription: Now that you've started location-stamping your digital photos with the WWMX Location Stamper Tool, what can you do with them? Well, using the WWMX Travelogue tool, you can create a set of HTML pages to show off your vacation! This utility takes a set of location-stamped JPEG photos and an optional set of GPS track files and creates an HTML page . Last published: November 17, 2005.
detailsSection: Now that you've started location-stamping your digital photos with the WWMX Location Stamper Tool, what can you do with them? Well, using the WWMX Travelogue tool, you can create a set of HTML pages to show off your vacation! This utility takes a set of location-stamped JPEG photos and an optional set of GPS track files and creates an HTML page ready for transfer to your personal website, complete with a map overlaid with your tracks and dots for your photos. This 1.0 version is pretty basic, but we're planning on creating much more complex and rich experiences in future releases.
